metadata.description: USDA-validated condiment nutrition data per 100g. All values sourced from official USDA FoodData Central database.
metadata.notes: Calories calculated from macros using Atwater factors: Protein (4 kcal/g), Fat (9 kcal/g), Carbs (4 kcal/g)

condiments.name: Italian Dressing
condiments.validation_notes: Original reported 43 cal but 0 from macros - corrected to USDA value of 102 kcal. Commercial regular variety.

condiments.name: Balsamic Vinegar
condiments.validation_notes: Original reported 14 cal, calculated 70 from incorrect macros - corrected to USDA value of 88 kcal with 17.03g carbs.

condiments.name: Vinegar, Distilled (White Vinegar)
condiments.validation_notes: Original reported 3 cal - corrected to USDA value of 18 kcal. Contains 5-8% acetic acid with trace carbs.

condiments.name: Hot Sauce (Pepper Sauce)
condiments.validation_notes: Original reported 1 cal - corrected to USDA value of 11 kcal. High in sodium and Vitamin C (75mg).

condiments.name: BBQ Sauce (Barbecue Sauce)
condiments.validation_notes: Original reported 29 cal - corrected to USDA value of 172 kcal. High sugar content with net carbs ~39.87g.

condiments.name: Ketchup (Catsup)
condiments.validation_notes: USDA validated at 101 kcal. High in sodium and contains Vitamin A (527 IU).

condiments.name: Mustard, Yellow, Prepared
condiments.validation_notes: USDA validated at 60 kcal. Contains mustard seeds, water, vinegar, salt, and turmeric. Good fiber content.

condiments.name: Mayonnaise, Regular
condiments.validation_notes: USDA validated at 680 kcal. Composition: 22.1% water, 1% protein, 0.6% carbs, 76.4% fat.

condiments.name: Soy Sauce (Shoyu)
condiments.validation_notes: USDA validated at 53 kcal. Very high in sodium (5493mg). Contains 57% protein, 34% carbs by calories.

condiments.name: Honey
condiments.validation_notes: USDA validated at 304 kcal. Nearly 100% carbohydrates. Contains trace amounts of vitamins and minerals.

condiments.name: Maple Syrup
condiments.validation_notes: USDA validated at 260 kcal. 87% of sugars are sucrose. Contains manganese, riboflavin, and zinc.

condiments.name: Olive Oil
condiments.validation_notes: USDA validated at 884 kcal. 100% fat - high in monounsaturated fatty acids. Contains Vitamin E and K.

condiments.name: Vegetable Oil
condiments.validation_notes: USDA validated at 884 kcal. 100% fat. Contains Vitamin E and K. Generic vegetable oil blend.

discrepancies_explained: italian_dressing: Major correction - was reporting 43 kcal with 0 macros, now corrected to 102 kcal
balsamic_vinegar: Corrected from 14 kcal to 88 kcal - original had incorrect carbohydrate values
vinegar_distilled: Corrected from 3 kcal to 18 kcal - trace carbs contribute calories
hot_sauce: Corrected from 1 kcal to 11 kcal - has measurable carbs and protein
bbq_sauce: Major correction from 29 kcal to 172 kcal - high sugar content was underestimated
calculation_notes: Some USDA reported calories may not exactly match calculated values due to:
2. Presence of alcohol (7 kcal/g) in fermented products
3. Modified Atwater factors for specific food types
4. Organic acids contributing calories differently than standard carbs
5. Water and ash content affecting density calculations
The USDA reported calorie value is the authoritative measurement
